analysis.summary: The test results indicate that 5 out of 6 tests passed, resulting in an 83.3% pass rate. The average duration of the tests is 6723ms. The failed test case, 'Login with valid credentials', encountered issues in 3 out of 9 steps, specifically related to the expected page redirection and expected messages not being found.
coverageGaps: Scenarios related to successful login with valid credentials
trends: Failures in tests related to expected page navigation and content validation
recommendations: Investigate and fix the issues in the 'Login with valid credentials' test case
Expand test coverage to include more scenarios for successful login
criticalIssues: Issues with the 'Login with valid credentials' test case that impact critical functionality

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page at https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm
Enter valid username 'ficusroot'
Enter valid password 'katal@n@ravi'
Click the 'Log In' button
Verify that the user is redirected to the account overview page (EXPECT: SUCCESS)
steps.error: Expected to be redirected to overview page

steps.step: Verify that the welcome message with the customer name is displayed
Verify that the Accounts Overview section is displayed
Verify that the available accounts are listed with account numbers and balances
Verify that the right-side navigation menu is displayed with banking options

errors: Step 5: Expected to be redirected to overview page; Step 6: Expected "Welcome" message not found; Step 7: Expected "Accounts Overview" heading not found

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page at https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm
Enter invalid username 'invaliduser'
Enter valid password 'katal@n@ravi'
Click the 'Log In' button
Verify that the login is unsuccessful and an error message is displayed (EXPECT: FAILURE)
Navigate to the ParaBank login page at https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm
Enter valid username 'ficusroot'
Enter invalid password 'invalidpass'
Click the 'Log In' button
Verify that the login is unsuccessful and an error message is displayed (EXPECT: FAILURE)

results.testName: Login with empty username and password

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page at https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm
Leave the username field empty
Leave the password field empty
Click the 'Log In' button
Verify that the login is unsuccessful and an error message is displayed (EXPECT: FAILURE)

results.testName: Attempt to access account overview page without login

steps.step: Navigate directly to the account overview page at https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/overview.htm
Verify that the user is redirected to the login page and unable to access the account overview page (EXPECT: FAILURE)

results.testName: Verify login page accessibility and input validation

steps.step: Navigate to the ParaBank login page at https://parabank.parasoft.com/parabank/index.htm
Verify that the login page is accessible
Verify that the username and password fields are properly labeled
Verify that the password field masks the input
Verify that the login button is clickable when both fields have values
Verify that the login completes within 2 seconds
Verify that the password is encrypted in transit
